definition: campaign/expedition
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack
to fight/fight/war/battle

sentences.english: There was a time, long ago, when Ewoks would war among each other.
sentences.chinese: 伊沃克人互相征战的时代逝去已久。

sentences.english: Vosa was with Dooku on Galidraan when the Jedi all but vanquished the Mandalorian ranks.
sentences.chinese: 沃萨随杜库征战加利德兰，绝地几乎全灭曼达洛人。

sentences.english: Van der Vart is also on World Cup duty with Holland.
sentences.chinese: 范特瓦特同样在世界杯赛场上，他在荷兰队阵中征战。

sentences.english: This season they made their worst start in 89 years of league football.
sentences.chinese: 本赛季庞贝的开局是球队89年联赛征战史上最差的。

sentences.english: Patrick is the most popular driver in IndyCar.
sentences.chinese: 她目前是征战印地系列赛赛车手中，人气最旺的一个。

sentences.english: Gamorreans live in clans, and these clans are the basis for their wars.
sentences.chinese: 加莫人以氏族为社会单位，相互征战。

sentences.english: Jonathan Zebina and Mohamed Sissoko are both ruled of the running.
sentences.chinese: 泽比纳和西索科被排除在此次客场征战罗马的名单中。

sentences.english: The characters in the two films swing their  swords for very different reasons.
sentences.chinese: 两部影片中，木兰们征战沙场的原因各不相同。

sentences.english: There is a military character in Qin s culture which is born in multifarious wars.
sentences.chinese: 萌生于频繁征战的秦文化先天具有军事性。

sentences.english: As a result of yesterday's battle on behalf of Spain to the Confederations Cup.
sentences.chinese: 由于要代表西班牙征战联合会杯的比赛的缘故。

sentences.english: David Trezeguet and Zlatan Ibrahimovic have been told they will be playing in Serie B next season.
sentences.chinese: 特雷泽盖和伊布被通知他们下赛季随队征战乙级。

sentences.english: Over time, Merduk and Innana began to hate one another and eventually warred upon one another.
sentences.chinese: 他们随时间流逝开始彼此仇恨，并最终彼此征战。

sentences.english: The Azulones will play Europa League football next term.
sentences.chinese: 赫塔菲将在下赛季征战欧联杯。

sentences.english: Now they find themselves playing in the Europa League instead next season.
sentences.chinese: 而现在，他们还是只能在下赛季征战欧联杯。

sentences.english: And are Paro and Marchisio ready for the top flight?
sentences.chinese: 那么，帕罗和马尔奇西奥有实力在顶级联赛中征战吗？

sentences.english: And we believe that a lot of spiritual warfares are happening because of CCCC.
sentences.chinese: 如同前面我们说过，这是一场属灵征战。

definition: to go into battle/to campaign (military)
lit. old general/commander-in-chief 將帥|将帅, the equivalent of king in Chinese chess/fig. old-timer/veteran
effectiveness/positive effect/to serve (in some capacity)
to lead/to command/to head
combat/to fight
achievement/meritorious deed/contributions (for the good of society)
war on all sides (idiom); fighting from all four quarters
to return to
to enlist/to draft/to conscript/to appoint to an official position
strong contingent/elite squad
racetrack/field (for athletics competition)
New Armies (modernized Qing armies, trained and equipped according to Western standards, founded after Japan's victory in the First Sino-Japanese War in 1895)
to compete/to take part in a competition
to take (after a struggle)/to wrest/to seize/to capture/to win (a trophy)
to lead troups/(fig.) to lead/leading
to start a war/to make war/to battle against
